name: bj-chvarv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w1), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| w1
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| w1
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w0))

comment: Version of ~ chvar with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
